Title: IAGA2002 Parser
Description: Parse IAGA2002 data files and handle missing data
Requirements: Parse sec/min files and generate metadata

Title: MiniSEED Ingest
Description: Parse MiniSEED data and extract waveforms
Requirements: Extract waveform data and station info
VerifySteps: Verify that data is correctly parsed and stored

Title: Kalman Filtering
Description: Apply Kalman filter to geomagnetic data
Requirements: Apply Kalman filter for noise reduction
VerifySteps: Verify filtering process with before and after comparison

Title: Feature Calculation
Description: Calculate energy features for seismic data

Title: Time Alignment
Description: Align all data sources to a common time grid
Requirements: Generate a 1-min time grid for all sources

Title: Event Linkage
Description: Implement event matching based on time and space
Requirements: Match events within N hours and K km radius
VerifySteps: Verify correct linkage with test events

Title: Anomaly Scoring
Description: Develop anomaly detection model using thresholds
VerifySteps: Validate anomalies detected for sample events

Title: FastAPI Endpoints
Description: Develop FastAPI endpoints for data querying
Requirements: Create endpoints for raw, linked, and feature data
VerifySteps: Perform API tests to ensure correct responses

Title: Plotly Visualization
Description: Create visualization for time series and heatmaps
Requirements: Generate time series and heatmap plots for events
VerifySteps: Ensure plots display correctly with event data
